name: Kitten Burst
storyline: Hapi, a down on their luck racing cat, teams up with a hacker named S4br aboard the cybership “The Eternal September”. Together they travel to abandoned sites, siphoning energy to power their Ion Drive. Can the team pull off their scheme, or will the future of cyberspace be controlled by the megacorp pando?
summary: Kitten Burst is an adventure/racing game about a flying cat set in the year 200X. Explore abandoned sites, and race through circuits to save Cyberspace.
